data.name: Authorization_Description
data.value: You are not authorized to view this page.

data.name: Authorization_Login
data.value: You are not authorized to view this page. Please login with proper credentials to proceed to this page.

data.name: Authorization_Title
data.value: Access Denied

data.name: CannotFindLicenseFile
data.value: License file cannot be found. Please register your MonoX installation and place the license in the bin folder.

data.name: DomainNotLicensed
data.value: Domain {0} is not in the list of licensed domains. Please register this domain.

data.name: EmailSendingFailed
data.value: An error has occured while sending you an e-mail. Please try again, if the problem persists, please contact us.

data.name: EntityIdRequired
data.value: Entity id required!

data.name: ImageTypeRequired
data.value: Image type is required!

data.name: LicenseExpired
data.value: This license has expired. Please obtain a valid license and place it to the bin folder of this portal.

data.name: Membership_Create_UnknownError
data.value: An unknown error occured. The account could not be created, please try again later. If the problem persists, please contact us.

data.name: Membership_DuplicateEmail
data.value: An user with this e-mail address already exists.

data.name: Membership_DuplicateUserName
data.value: An user with this user name already exists.

data.name: Membership_InvalidPassword
data.value: The password you provided is invalid. It must be at least {0} character(s) long{1}.

data.name: Membership_InvalidPassword_Suffix
data.value: and contain at least {0} non-alphanumeric character(s).

data.name: Membership_Update_UnknownError
data.value: An unknown error occured. The account could not be updated, please try again later. If the problem persists, please contact us.

data.name: NumberOfUsersExceeded
data.value: Number of portal users for a free edition of MonoX was exceeded. Please purchase a commercial license to remove this limilation.

data.name: PageNotFound
data.value: Page not found

data.name: PageNotFoundDescription
data.value: We couldn't find the page you requested.

data.name: SessionExpired_Description
data.value: A certain amount of time has elapsed since your last browsing action. As a result, the temporary data for this page has expired and you need to start your current browsing process from the beginning.

data.name: SessionExpired_Title
data.value: Session Expired

data.name: SignatureNotValid
data.value: The signature in your license file is not valid. Please obtain a valid license file.

data.name: ToContinueWorkingWithApplication
data.value: To continue working with the application please click

data.name: ToContinueWorkingWithApplicationClickHere
data.value: here

data.name: Unexpected_Title
data.value: Unexpected Error

data.name: UnhandledError
data.value: An error has occured in the application.

data.name: UnhandledErrorLongMessage
data.value: This event has been logged and will be addressed by the maintenance department. We appreciate your patience.

data.name: VersionError
data.value: The license file needs to be upgraded to version {0}.

data.name: PageNotFoundPersonalizationFound
data.value: We couldn't find the page you requested but the database contains personalization data for the page.

data.name: PageNotFoundRemovePersonalization
data.value: Do you want to remove personalization data for the page?
